nhc_headline: ...DEBBY STRENGTHENING AS IT HEADS TOWARD THE FLORIDA BIG BEND  AREA... ...WILL BRING A MAJOR FLOOD THREAT TO THE SOUTHEASTERN UNITED STATES THIS WEEK...
summary:
...DEBBY STRENGTHENING AS IT HEADS TOWARD THE FLORIDA BIG BEND  AREA... ...WILL BRING A MAJOR FLOOD THREAT TO THE SOUTHEASTERN UNITED STATES THIS WEEK...
 As of 8:00 PM EDT Sun Aug 4
 the center of Debby was located near 28.1, -84.1
 with movement N at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 992 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.
